name: hermaphrodite
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant or animal that has both male and female sex organs: Earthworms are hermaphrodites, though they cannot fertilize their own eggs. Most flowering plants are hermaphrodites, with male and female organs present on the same plant.
old-fashioned an offensive word for a person with both male and female sex organs See also
intersex specialized
